body: Wow, what a game. It went better than my wildest dreams. Now here's to hoping that the Cats keep it up for the rest of the series...
Also, I'm not quite sure how I'm gonna be doing these semi-liveblogs, so if this pages changes repeately this week, im just experimenting.
If you're wondering where game 2 is: IT WASNT TELEVISED WHERE I LIVE.
I'm happy about the win, but man am I bitter I couldn't actually watch the game.
ESPN if you don't air Game 3 I will personally walk to your offices & throw your video mixers down the stairs. Go Cats.
I've stopped complaining & am now watching the game on TBS.com.
The TBS app is the worst thing I've ever used.
Bit of a mixed bag. But we're still ahead, so I'm not tense yet.
